name: KPOP 1010
description:
KPOP 1010 Game. A small gift for KPOP fandom.
Specifically, BTS fandom.
Join and enjoy with "KPOP 1010 Game" now !!!

- Wang Rap Monster (Kim Namjoon; 김남준)
- Jin (Kim Seokjin; 김석진)
- Suga (Min Yoongi; 민윤기),
- J Hope (Jung Hoseok; 정호석),
- Jimin (Park Jimin; 박지민),
- V (Kim Taehyung; 김태형) and
- Jungkook (Jeon Jeongguk; 전정국)

How to Play:
- Drag the blocks and arange in the 10x10 grids.
- Make the blocks line horizontally or vertically will be clear.
- The game over when there's no space to put any more block.
- The goal is to get as many scores as possible!

Game Features:
- Easy and fun to play.
- Nice graphics and best sounds.
- No time limits.
- Auto-save game for next time.
- 7skin modes: you can choose 1 for your style.
- Leader board: you can compare your score with your friends and other players!

Are you ready? Let's go!

Support: help.bonbonmobile@gmail.com
